template_input_params.name: dns_userid
template_input_params.label: WinRM - Dns Userid
template_input_params.description: The userid used for the connection to Windows DNS Server

template_input_params.name: dns_password
template_input_params.label: WinRM - Dns Password
template_input_params.description: The password used for the connection to Windows DNS Server

template_input_params.name: dns_server
template_input_params.label: WinRM - Dns Server
template_input_params.description: Windows DNS Server Hostname or IP

template_input_params.name: winrm_use_ntlm
template_input_params.label: WINRM -NTLM or Basic Authentication
template_input_params.description: Default set to true to use NTLM authentication, rather than basic authentication

template_input_params.name: winrm_insecure
template_input_params.label: WINRM - Insecure
template_input_params.description: Default set to true to not validate the HTTPS certificate chain

template_input_params.name: winrm_https
template_input_params.label: WINRM - HTTPS
template_input_params.description: Default set to true to connect using HTTPS (port 5986) instead of HTTP (port 5985)

template_input_params.name: winrm_port
template_input_params.label: WINRM - Ports
template_input_params.description: Default set to HTTPS (port 5986) instead of HTTP (port 5985)
